<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> a man who was <S%G3885>paralyzed,<s%> <S%G906>lying<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G2825>bed.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G3885>paralytic,<s%> <S%G5043>"Son,<s%> <S%G2293>cheer<s%> <S%G4675>up!<s%> Your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>.." <S%G5119>(then<s%> <S%G3004>he<s%> said to the <S%G1453>paralytic<s%>), "Get up, and take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2825>mat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>"
He <S%G1453>arose<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1492>when<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2296>it,<s%> they marveled <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G3855>As<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> passed <S%G3855>by<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the tax <S%G5058>collection<s%> <S%G2532>office.<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G190>"Follow<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>" <S%G2532>He<s%> got up <S%G450>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G846>happened<s%> <S%G345>as<s%> he <S%G345>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2532>house,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> tax <S%G5057>collectors<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> came <S%G2064>and<s%> sat down <S%G4873>with<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G1492>When<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2036>it,<s%> they said <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1223>disciples,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> does <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1320>teacher<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> tax <S%G5057>collectors<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G268>sinners?<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> you go <S%G4198>and<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> this <S%G2076>means:<s%> <S%G2309><s%> 'I desire <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%>' <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%>'s <S%G3101>disciples<s%> came <S%G4334>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1223>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> <S%G3522>do<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G4183>often,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G3522>fast?<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3361>them,<s%> <S%G1410>"Can<s%> the <S%G5207>friends<s%> of the <S%G3567>bridegroom<s%> <S%G3996>mourn,<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> long <S%G3745>as<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them?<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> will be <S%G522>taken<s%> away <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> they will <S%G3522>fast.<s%>

<S%G1161>No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1911>puts<s%> <S%G1161>a<s%> <S%G1915>piece<s%> of <S%G46>unshrunk<s%> <S%G4470>cloth<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2440>an<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2440>garment;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G4138>patch<s%> would <S%G142>tear<s%> away <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2440>garment,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5501>worse<s%> <S%G4978>hole<s%> is <S%G1096>made.<s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> do people <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G779>wineskins,<s%> or <S%G3361>else<s%> the <S%G779>skins<s%> would <S%G4486>burst,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%> be <S%G1632>spilled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G779>skins<s%> <S%G622>ruined.<s%> <S%G235>No,<s%> they <S%G906>put<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2537>fresh<s%> <S%G779>wineskins,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> are <S%G4933>preserved.<s%>"

<S%G2980>While<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2980>told<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2980>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G758>ruler<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2064>and<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G2364>daughter<s%> has <S%G737>just<s%> <S%G5053>died,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> come <S%G2064>and<s%> <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she will <S%G2198>live.<s%>"

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> who had an issue of <S%G131>blood<s%> for <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G3693>behind<s%> <S%G680>him,<s%> and touched the <S%G2899>fringe<s%> <S%G2440>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> she <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>herself,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> I <S%G3440>just<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment,<s%> I will be made <S%G4982>well.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> turning <S%G1994>around<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2364>"Daughter,<s%> <S%G2293>cheer<s%> <S%G4675>up!<s%> Your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G4982>well.<s%>" <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> was made <S%G4982>well<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G2064>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G758>ruler<s%>'s <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the flute <S%G834>players,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> in noisy <S%G2350>disorder,<s%>

he <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Make <S%G402>room,<s%> <S%G1063>because<s%> the <S%G2877>girl<s%> <S%G3756>isn't<s%> <S%G599>dead,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2518>sleeping.<s%>" <S%G2532>They<s%> were <S%G2606>ridiculing<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3793>crowd<s%> was put <S%G1544>out,<s%> he entered <S%G2902>in,<s%> took <S%G846>her<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2877>girl<s%> <S%G1453>arose.<s%>
<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G5345>report<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> went <S%G2532>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1093>land.<s%>

As <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3855>passed<s%> by from <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2896>calling<s%> out <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "Have mercy <S%G1653>on<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David!<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> he had <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> the blind <S%G5185>men<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Do <S%G4100>you<s%> believe <S%G3754>that<s%> I am <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5124>this?<s%>" They told <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G680>he<s%> touched <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "According <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G5213>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> be <S%G1096>it<s%> done to <S%G5213>you.<s%>"

<S%G846>Their<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G455>opened.<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> strictly <S%G1690>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3708>"See<s%> that no <S%G3367>one<s%> knows about <S%G1097>this.<s%>"
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> and spread <S%G1310>abroad<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1310>fame<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1093>land.<s%>
<S%G1161>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> went <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G2974>mute<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> who was <S%G1139>demon<s%> possessed was <S%G4374>brought<s%> to <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1544>When<s%> the <S%G1140>demon<s%> was cast <S%G1544>out,<s%> the <S%G2974>mute<s%> man <S%G2980>spoke.<s%> <S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G5316>"Nothing<s%> <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G3779>this<s%> has <S%G3763>ever<s%> been <S%G5316>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2474>Israel!<s%>"
<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> "By the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>demons,<s%> he casts <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>demons.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the Good News of the <S%G932>Kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> he was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2258>they<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> harassed <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4263>scattered,<s%> like sheep without a <S%G4166>shepherd.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>he<s%> said to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "The <S%G2326>harvest<s%> indeed is <S%G4183>plentiful,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G2040>laborers<s%> are <S%G3641>few.<s%>
